translationtableentry.text: Learn to play Imperivm: Great Battles of Rome.
translationtableentry.result: Aprende a jugar Imperivm: Las Grandes Batallas de Roma.

translationtableentry.text: Impara a giocare a Imperivm: Le Grandi Battaglie di Roma.
translationtableentry.result: Aprende a jugar Imperivm: Las Grandes Batallas de Roma.

translationtableentry.text: The great Caesar has died! Please restart!
translationtableentry.result: ¡El gran César ha muerto! ¡Reinicia la partida!

translationtableentry.text: The praetorians have died! Please restart!
